channel.title: About on Rehan Vipin
channel.description: Recent content in About on Rehan Vipin

item.title: Notes
item.description: Place for notes I’ll make in future courses

item.title: Projects
item.description: Some projects I’ve worked on :) Favourites for each category. Not part of work. Check resume for more serious ones and github for other less serious ones :P. Cryptography Portable file security. Similar to AxCrypt Collection of cryptographic protocol implementations. e.g. Oblivious transfer Systems Hadoop YARN clone + analysis for map-reduce jobs Rootless lightweight containers Multithreaded webserver in C, with some Apache like features Deep learning A text editor that predicts what you want to type, in C A program that writes a story/script given an initial paragraph Games Flappy-bird clone with GUI leaderboards and user login systems Andromeda is a toy pandemic simulator Web development A platform to distribute files on LAN with duplex messaging and user logins Also maintained the above project for hacktoberfest 2019 where it received contributions from various users.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m a Junior at PES University studying Computer Science Engineering. Domains I’m majorly interested in - Cryptography Hacking around systems and distributed systems Quantum mechanics and quantum information science Algorithms (Discrete optimization, Game theory) Deep learning (reinforcement learning) I love hacking systems (not cracking them!) to learn how they work. I like Developer communities and collaborative learning too. My hobbies include Cycling, Drawing and reading Mystery books :)
